text: Pseudophilautus zimmeri is a frog. It lived in Sri Lanka. Scientists have seen it in exactly one place: Galle, where Sri Lanka's land meets the ocean. This frog is extinct. Every frog in this species is dead. Scientists believe that this is because human beings changed the places where the frog lived too much. One adult male frog was 31.6 mm long from nose to rear end. ==First paper== * ==References== Category:Frogs of Asia
title: Pseudophilautus zimmeri
